name: dysthymia
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a form of depression (= a mental illness causing feelings of unhappiness) that lasts for several years and but is less severe than other forms of depression: Low energy, poor concentration, and feelings of helplessness are common symptoms of dysthymia.
